String.Source: If you're truly dead, then savor each moment you walk among the living.
String.Dest: 如果你真的死了，你漫步生者之间，再细细品味每一刻。

String.Source: If you're truly dead, then savor each moment you walk among the living.
String.Dest: 如果你真的死了，你漫步生者之间，再细细品味每一刻。

String.Source: Why not have children? They're wonderful.
String.Dest: 为什么不可以有孩子呢？他们多可爱啊。

String.Source: Considering what I know now, I can see why you felt misled.
String.Dest: 考虑到我现在所掌握的信息，我想我知道你困惑的原因。

String.Source: Considering what I know now, I can see why you felt misled.
String.Dest: 考虑到我现在所掌握的信息，我想我知道你困惑的原因。

String.Source: Considering what I know now, I can see why you felt misled.
String.Dest: 考虑到我现在所掌握的信息，我想我知道你困惑的原因。

String.Source: Considering what I know now, I can see why you felt misled.
String.Dest: 考虑到我现在所掌握的信息，我想我知道你困惑的原因了。

String.Source: Wait, you two aren't married? Isn't that odd to adopt first?
String.Dest: 等等，你俩没结婚？不先把事儿办了难道不奇怪吗？

String.Source: Children are godless monsters and should be chained until adulthood.
String.Dest: 儿童是毫无善心的怪兽，直到他们成人之前都应该把他们栓起来。

String.Source: Children are godless monsters and should be chained until adulthood.
String.Dest: 儿童是毫无善心的怪兽，直到他们成人之前都应该把他们栓起来。

String.Source: What do you mean, vanish from this world?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思，从这世界上消失？

String.Source: Perhaps he wants to know what kind of mother you are first.
String.Dest: 可能他想先了解你是哪一种类型的母亲。

String.Source: Perhaps he wants to know what kind of mother you are first.
String.Dest: 可能他想先了解你是哪一种类型的母亲。

String.Source: If you're a corpse, then I'm a goat.
String.Dest: 如果你是具尸体，那我就是头山羊了。

String.Source: If you're a corpse, then I'm a goat.
String.Dest: 如果你是具尸体，那我就是头山羊了。

String.Source: You look plenty alive to me.
String.Dest: 我看你是活蹦乱跳的啊。

String.Source: You look plenty alive to me.
String.Dest: 我看你是活蹦乱跳的啊。

String.Source: Why do you think you died that day?
String.Dest: 你为什么认为自己会死在那一天？

String.Source: Why do you think you died that day?
String.Dest: 你为什么认为自己会死在那一天？

String.Source: From what I've gathered so far, you're husband is an idiot.
String.Dest: 就我目前了解到的而言……你丈夫是个白痴。

String.Source: From what I've gathered so far, you're husband is an idiot.
String.Dest: 就我目前了解到的而言……你丈夫是个白痴。

String.Source: From what I've gathered so far, you're husband is an idiot.
String.Dest: 就我目前了解到的而言……你丈夫是个白痴。

String.Source: From what I've gathered so far, you're husband is an idiot.
String.Dest: 就我目前了解到的而言……你丈夫是个白痴。

String.Source: This is all due to your own misunderstanding. It's not his fault.
String.Dest: 这一切完全是你的误会导致的。并不是他的错。

String.Source: This is all due to your own misunderstanding. It's not his fault.
String.Dest: 这一切完全是你的误会导致的。并不是他的错。

String.Source: This is all due to your own misunderstanding. It's not his fault.
String.Dest: 这一切完全是你的误会导致的。并不是他的错。

String.Source: This is all due to your own misunderstanding. It's not his fault.
String.Dest: 这一切完全是你的误会导致的。并不是他的错。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: If what you say is true, how did it happen?
String.Dest: 如果你说的都是真的，那到底是怎么发生的？

String.Source: If what you say is true, how did it happen?
String.Dest: 如果你说的都是真的，那到底是怎么发生的？

String.Source: Part of me knew it wasn't love. The Gods wouldn't be so cruel.
String.Dest: 我知道这不是爱。神不会如此残忍。

String.Source: And on this, our wedding day, I have never been more in love. I have never felt more alive.
String.Dest: 在我们婚礼的那天，我感受到了前所未有的爱与活力。

String.Source: Your flattery won't work, Kjoli. Not this time. You know as well as I that we are in no position to adopt.
String.Dest: 恭维我也没用，卡欧里。这次不行。你我同样清楚我们不可能接受它。

String.Source: Many thanks. I don't think I would have ever seen this day if not for your help.
String.Dest: 多谢。要不是你的帮忙我就不可能看到这一天。

String.Source: My love, one of these days your flattery won't work on me. But today is not that day.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，在以前的日子里你的那些好言好语我都没有去理睬，不过今天可不一样。

String.Source: Kjoli thinks we keep no secrets, but I have never told him the truth. I am already dead.
String.Dest: 卡欧里认为我们之前没有秘密，但我从没有告诉他真相，我已经死了。

String.Source: He wasn't the handsomest man, and his arms quivered as he held me. Yet there was something there. A spark.
String.Dest: 他不是最帅气的那个人，并且他挽住我的时候连胳膊都在抖。经管如此我们还是一见钟情了，擦出了火花。

String.Source: That...that idiot! A child! What was he thinking! What kind of couple adopts before marriage!
String.Dest: 这……这个白痴！一个孩子！他是怎么想的！什么样的夫妇才会在结婚前收养个孩子啊！

String.Source: Seriously Kjoli, a child? By Secunda! I thought we were here to see the forest. I thought we came to Riften to...
String.Dest: 说真的卡欧里，一个孩子？塞康达在上！我以为我们是来看霜雪的。我以为我们是来裂谷城要去...

String.Source: I awoke the next morning with my wound dressed. Kjoli said I missed my heart by an inch. But deep down, I knew I had not.
String.Dest: 第二天早上醒来时，我的伤口已经包扎好了。卡欧里说只差一英吋就会伤到心脏。但事实上，我知道并没有那么回事儿。

String.Source: Then I will want nothing more than to share our love with another. But not now!
String.Dest: 我迫不及待地想和其他人分享我们的爱。但不是现在！

String.Source: Well, nobody's perfect.
String.Dest: 好吧，没有人是完美的。

String.Source: Yet even then he is not so foolish as to put the cart before the horse. I don't understand why he would think this is okay!
String.Dest: 虽然他蠢不到把拖车挂在马头前面的程度。我也不相信他怎么能接受得了这个！

String.Source: While he is off dancing in the forest, I am planning our course, so that we won't get lost.
String.Dest: 当他在森林里无所事事的跳舞的时候，我则规划了一下前进方向，这样我们就不会迷路了。

String.Source: Now, I fear I may vanish from this world, having never had that question answered.
String.Dest: 现在，恐怕我要从这个世界上消失了，就像从来没有回答过这个问题一样。

String.Source: Now, I fear I may vanish from this world, having never had that question answered.
String.Dest: 现在，恐怕我要从这个世界上消失了，就像从来没有回答过这个问题一样。

String.Source: Now, I fear I may vanish from this world, having never had that question answered.
String.Dest: 现在，恐怕我要从这个世界上消失了，就像从来没有回答过这个问题一样。

String.Source: Damn you, poet! Damn you! The one time you decide not to be romantic!
String.Dest: 去你大爷的，该死的诗人！这次你终于决定不那么不切实际了！

String.Source: My love. I'm sorry. I never knew. It's just...I am on borrowed time, and I thought...
String.Dest: 亲爱的。我很抱歉。我从来不知道。我只是……我只是在靠着借来的日子活命，而且我想……

String.Source: (Sigh) I can always tell when he has a secret. The corner of his mouth twists up into this impish little grin.
String.Dest: (叹息)他一有秘密我就能感觉的到，那时候他的嘴角会微微上挑，露出一撮略带顽皮的笑容。

String.Source: (Sigh) I can always tell when he has a secret. The corner of his mouth twists up into this impish little grin.
String.Dest: (叹息)他一有秘密我就能感觉的到，那时候他的嘴角会微微上挑，露出一撮略带顽皮的笑容。

String.Source: (Sigh) I can always tell when he has a secret. The corner of his mouth twists up into this impish little grin.
String.Dest: (叹息)他一有秘密我就能感觉的到，那时候他的嘴角会微微上挑，露出一撮略带顽皮的笑容。

String.Source: As do I. Now and forever.
String.Dest: 我也是。无论现在还是永远。

String.Source: But another part of me wanted just one more day, one more minute, to find out if it was.
String.Dest: 可是我的另一部分要的只是再多一天，甚至多一分钟能重温，如果曾有爱的话。.

String.Source: I'm not dying, love. I'm dead. And what difference does it make, when I'm dead to you.
String.Dest: 我不是快死了，亲爱的。我已经死了。当我对你而言早就死去了的时候，这一切又有什么区别呢。

String.Source: Kjoli! You were listening the whole time?
String.Dest: 卡欧里！你一直在偷听？

String.Source: It is in the details. I once had a great appetite, and now I never hunger. I used to sleep until the noon hour, and now...
String.Dest: 这是细节问题。我过去胃口很大，而现在一点也不会饥饿。我过去一觉睡到大中午，而现在……

String.Source: Now do you understand why I am so frustrated? It makes no sense!
String.Dest: 现在你明白我为啥这么沮丧了吧？这太没道理了！

String.Source: Appearances can deceive. How else can you explain why I never hunger, and never sleep?
String.Dest: 外表是有欺骗性的。你能解释我永远不会饥饿，永远不用睡觉是怎么回事儿吗？

String.Source: Appearances can deceive. How else can you explain why I never hunger, and never sleep?
String.Dest: 外表是有欺骗性的。你能解释我永远不会饥饿，永远不用睡觉是怎么回事儿吗？

String.Source: Then...you wish to marry?
String.Dest: 然后……你想结婚吗？

String.Source: We met at a temple. He came there to pray. I came there to die.
String.Dest: 我们在一座神庙见了面。他去是为了祈祷。我去是为了死。

String.Source: It is not about having children. That isn't why I'm upset. This is about us. Kjoli and I.
String.Dest: 跟有没有孩子没关系。我就是因为这个才难过的。这只跟我和卡欧里有关。

String.Source: Someday, yes! When my whiskers start to fall, your hair turns gray, and the libraries are filled with your poetry.
String.Dest: 总有一天，对啊！等到我胡子开始掉了，你的头发都变白了，图书馆里就会装满你的诗集了。

String.Source: Kjoli, you fool. Did you ever consider your father was just too cheap to buy an Amulet of Mara?
String.Dest: 卡欧里，你个蠢驴。你有没有想过你爸爸穷得根本连玛拉的护符都买不起了？

String.Source: Flattery will not save me. Words are just words.
String.Dest: 说好话也救不了我的。言语终究是言语。

String.Source: And then I could tell him, that I was wrong about him, I was wrong about us. That all of this was worth it in the end.
String.Dest: 到那时我就能告诉他，是我误会了他，我误会了我们所有人。从结果看来一切都是值得的。

String.Source: And then I could tell him, that I was wrong about him, I was wrong about us. That all of this was worth it in the end.
String.Dest: 到那时我就能告诉他，是我误会了他，我误会了我们所有人。从结果看来一切都是值得的。

String.Source: And then I could tell him, that I was wrong about him, I was wrong about us. That all of this was worth it in the end.
String.Dest: 到那时我就能告诉他，是我误会了他，我误会了我们所有人。从结果看来一切都是值得的。

String.Source: But the Gods will not grant me a second favor.
String.Dest: 可神灵不会再帮我第二次了。

String.Source: No, children are beautiful, and I am sure under different circumstances, we could have raised a wonderful family.
String.Dest: 才没有，小孩很好啊，我相信不管发生什么样的事，我们都能组建一个美好的家庭。

String.Source: My Kjoli does not think that far ahead. He is like a child, always falling victim to whim.
String.Dest: 我的卡欧里不认为这是什么难事。他就像个孩子，总是幻想的受害者。

String.Source: I heard a scream. It was Kjoli, running to my side. I remember tilting my head back, as the life faded from my body.
String.Dest: 我听到一声尖叫。卡欧里跑到了我身边。我记得我的头向后仰，如同生命从我身体中流逝。

String.Source: Forgive me, Kjoli. That day, when I plunged the dagger in my chest, I was certain it had struck my heart.
String.Dest: 原谅我，卡欧里。那一天，当我把匕首插入自己胸口的时候，我肯定它刺中了我的心脏。

String.Source: Moons bless you, Mara protect you. May all your roads lead to warm sands.
String.Dest: 双月祝福你，玛拉庇佑你。愿你的前路是温暖的沙地。

String.Source: This is why you bring me here? You want to adopt a child?
String.Dest: 这就是你带我来这里的原因？你想收养一个孩子？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: My Kjoli can be such a dumbass.
String.Dest: 我的卡欧里真是个蠢货。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: There you are! I've been looking all over for you, my love. The way you wander about, sometimes I wonder if I need to buy you a leash.
String.Dest: 你来啦！我一直在你平时闲逛的路上到处找你，我的爱人。有时候我在想，我到底是不是该买条项圈拴住你。

String.Source: Moons guide you.
String.Dest: 愿月光指引你。

String.Source: Sugar and sands, friend.
String.Dest: 糖和沙子, 朋友.

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: How can I help you?
String.Dest: 有什么我能效劳的？

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: When he said we were coming to Riften, I was certain he was going to propose.
String.Dest: 当他说我们要去裂谷城时，我肯定他在打算些什么。

String.Source: When he said we were coming to Riften, I was certain he was going to propose.
String.Dest: 当他说我们要去裂谷城时，我肯定他在打算些什么。

String.Source: When he said we were coming to Riften, I was certain he was going to propose.
String.Dest: 当他说我们要去裂谷城时，我肯定他在打算些什么。

String.Source: But every night I stay with him, and hope that if I keep him warm, there will come a time when he does not tremble.
String.Dest: 每晚我和他睡在一起并希望自己可以为他带来温暖，但从未能让他的颤抖停下。

String.Source: But every night I stay with him, and hope that if I keep him warm, there will come a time when he does not tremble.
String.Dest: 每晚我和他睡在一起并希望自己可以为他带来温暖，但从未能让他的颤抖停下。

String.Source: I no longer wanted any part of this world. I knelt before the Gods, asked for safe passage, and plunged the dagger into my heart.
String.Dest: 在这个世界上我生无可恋。我跪在神面前，请求他把我带走，并把匕首插进了自己的心脏。

String.Source: That's when I heard a scream. It was Kjoli, running to my side.
String.Dest: 就在那时我听到了一声尖叫。是卡里奥，他跑到了我身边。

String.Source: But another part of me, wanted just one more day, one more minute, to find out if it was.
String.Dest: 但我心中的一部分，渴望着能再来一天，哪怕只是一分钟，去寻找它是否是真的。

String.Source: How did you manage to survive?
String.Dest: 你是怎样活下来的？
